body.name: Chef Master 90019 Portable Butane Stove | 15,000 BTU Single Burner Gas Stove | Camping and Backpacking Essentials | Piezo Click Ignition | Double Wind Guard Burner | Hard Carrying Case
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 57 mins
features: PIEZO ELECTRIC IGNITION - The Chef Master 15,000 BTU Portable Camping Stove is designed with a Piezo electric ignition. This makes the stove super easy to start and easy to adjust the heat output. No need for a lighter as the burner ignites automatically.

EXTRA POWERFUL 15,000 BTU PORTABLE STOVE - The 90019 Butane Burner is designed to output up to 15,000 BTU. The heat can easily be controlled by a dial next to the piezo electric ignition button. This butane stove is powerful enough to cook anything that you may need on a camping or backpacking trip

CAMPING AND BACKPACKING ESSENTIALS - The Chef Master 15,000 BTU Portable Butane Camping Stove is essential for any camping or backpacking trip. This butane stove has a hard-shell carrying case which means that this unit is extra portable! The stove is small enough to easily fit in a hiking backpack or in a camping bag

PACKED WITH SAFETY FEATURES - This Butane Stove is packed with many essential safety features. It comes with an In-Line Regulator with Pressure-Sensing Shut-Off. If the pressure gets too high, the regulator will shut off flow to prevent dangerous flashbacks. The Butane Burner has a wind-guard to protect the flame from breeze or A/C.
PORTABLE CARRYING CASE - Each Butane Stove comes with a hard-shell carrying case to make the unit even more portable! It is easy to take this stove with you on every camping or hiking trip

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Leading Brand of Restaurant, Concession Stand and Food Service Cookware, Great for Campers! The Chef Master range of butane stoves was designed to be useful for those in the foodservice industry while still catering to everyone else. These butane stoves are great, easy to use, restaurant-quality portable butane stoves. These stoves can be used at concession stands, in a restaurant kitchen, or just outside the tent at a favorite camping ground! Chef Master Butane Stoves are very easy to use. Simply attach the butane canister and then turn up the heat! These stoves are great for cooking all sorts of different types of food in places where there is no access to a regular stove plate. There are 4 different models of Chef Master Portable Butane Stoves with different heat outputs. Each model can be used in many different ways and to cook thousands of different foods! 7,650 BTU Model10,000 BTU Model12,000 BTU Model15,000 BTU Model

Easily and Quickly Cook any Type of Food The Chef Master range of Portable Butane Stoves are powerful enough to cook any type of food. There are four different BTU models, 7,650 BTU, 10,000 BTU, 12,000 BTU, and 15,000 BTU. Easily and quickly enjoy the comforts of modern living when a stove or larger burner may not be accessible or just use when you need to cook more at once! Great for Use Outdoors - Camping, Hiking, Fishing, BBQs All the Chef Master Butane Stoves are ideal for use outdoors. These portable stoves are the perfect size and have the perfect amount of power to cook anything that a hungry tummy desires! Great for use on camping trips, hikes, fishing adventures and so many more! Compact Size for Maximum Portability The Chef Master Butane Stoves are compact efficient burners just waiting to fry that packet of fries or perfectly cook that steak. Each burner measures 14 inches high. Every stove comes with a carry case to make everyones' lives much easier! Simply put the burner in the case, click the locks shut, and you are ready for the next adventure.

Easy to Adjust Heat Dial Every Chef Master Butane Burner comes equip with a easy to use and adjust heat dial. Simply turn the dial to the level of heat that you want the stove to cook at. Wind Guard Reduces Loss of BTU/HR from Breeze or A/C Chef Master Portable Butane Stoves for Camping are designed with a special Wind Guard which reduces the loss of BTU/HR from breeze or A/C. This helps to ensure that the flame does not go out and keeps your food cooking! In Line Regulator with Pressure-Sensing Shut Off A Chef Master Butane Stove is equipped with an In-Line Regulator. When the pressure of the burner gets to high, flash backs can occur, this is solved by designing the stoves with a pressure-sensing shut off valve to cut off the pressure before flashbacks and injuries occur. Easy to Dismantle for Cleaning The Chef Master Portable Camping Stove is super easy to clean. Simply remove the plate from the top of the burner and then you can clean it! Leaving bits of old food and other gunk in your burner can be very dangerous so it is advised to clean the stove after every use.

Chef Master Butane Stove Lighting Instructions Chef Master Butane Stove Lighting Instructions The stove will only light when you turn the knob far enough. You must turn it PAST the point of resistance at 7pm. Ensure you turn it far enough to make it click loudly.
10,000 BTU Stoves are also available as a combination set with butane See the comparison chart below for a link to Combo listing of the stove and butane canisters in 1 package.

Chef Master 12,000 BTU Butane Stove 90235 Chef Master 7,650 BTU Butane Stove 90027 Chef Master 10,000 BTU Butane Stove 90011 Chef Master 15,000 BTU Butane Stove 90019 Stove Carry Bag Grill Boss 90057 Dual Fuel Stove BTU 12,000 7,650 10,000 15,000 Carry Bag 12,000 Color Silver Black Silver Silver Black Silver Carrying Case Included ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fuel Type Butane Butane Butane Butane Carry Bag Only Butane & Propane Dimensions 13" by 11" by 4" 13" by 11" by 4" 13" by 11" by 4" 13" by 11" by 4" 14.5" x 12.5" x 5" 13" by 11" by 4" Butane Fuel Included No Fuel No Fuel Stove Only Stove Only Carry Bag Only Stove Only

Chef Master Butane Stove Lighting Instructions Ensure you turn the knob PAST the first point of resistance, to make it click. Turn past 7 o'clock towards 6 o'clock. Did it light once and not again? Simply push the red reset button. The try again. Please contact the seller if you encounter any problems with lighting the stove. 99% of the time the issue with lighting is user error, where the user is not turning the knob far enough

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great flame control, works pretty well in wind, it's well made, and easy to use. Plus I use it at home so when cooking certain foods that stink up the house, I just take it outside. I live in hurricane alley so knowing I can use it when the powers out is also a plus. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to make fudge with. I have an electric stove at home- not good for candy making. I am incredibly impressed with this burner! It was so hot, I could not use it at full heat! Why I love this, is now I plan to use it with my wok too! I definitely can it stir fry on my electric stove either.I love that I can use it safely in my house. I also love the carrying case, so I can take it camping with me. I love the ease of use. I love how handy it is. The size it perfect. I just love it! By the way….. my fudge was perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little stove
reviews.reviewText: Light, small, lots of heat, love this thing. Canisters last a surprisingly long time. The case is also nice to have. Perfect for camping or cookouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Buyer beware, UPDATE!
reviews.reviewText: Update:After returning the product I was contacted by the company via email through Amazon. They offered to send a replacement and did so promptly. The replacement is in pristine condition and functions as described. My only comment is that it is lightweight and that may be the reason the original was damaged as for the rust inside I have no clue other than a leak in the packaging may have allowed moisture into the package.In any case, the stove is adequate for my intended use with consideration that like other products proper care, handling,cleaning and storage should provide years of use.In addition, the company was very responsive and courteous in dealing with this issue. In short, if I ever need another I would likely purchase this product again.The photos appeared to be a quality product, however reality not so much. It was cheaply constructed, damage that had been attempted to repair and not durable. The wind guard was damaged and badly repaired leaving copious rust on the product and inside the burner area. The materials were lightweight and not suitable for long term use. The price was high as were my expectations, sadly very dissatisfied and product returned for refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Terrific Ultra-Portable Powerful Burner
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this 15,000 BTU model to use for wok cooking as well as for high-heat searing the surface of sous vide steaks. It functions extremely well for both of those tasks, quickly heating pans to the "screaming hot" temperatures required for certain types of specialized cooking. It's also quite easy to use. From insertion of the butane cartridge, to lighting the burner, to ease of clean up, each task is a breeze.The burner is also quite lightweight and very portable. That's a positive benefit most of the time, however it does mean you shouldn't make vigorous shaking/tossing movements with a wok or you'll risk moving the burner, too. But using it with care is a small price to pay for the high output flame generated from this stove top.The only downside I've encountered is the "hard carrying case" that's included with the burner. "Hard" is not a word I would use to describe the flimsy plastic sheath-like thing that surrounded the stove when I opened the package. If the plastic used was any thinner, it would be translucent, and the tiny plastic hinges are laughable. Honestly, the case is an absolute joke ... a bad joke. A very bad joke.One more thing: Before I purchased this Chef Master 90019 15,000 BTU portable stove I asked other purchasers if non-Chef Master butane refills could be used. (I live in an area where butane canisters can't be shipped to individuals, and Chef Master brand items are not available in my state.) Although I didn't receive a satisfactory answer to my question at that time, I can provide the definitive answer now. Yes, other brands of 8 ounce butane canisters absolutely do work with this stove. I've used 8 ounce notched Sterno brand butane canisters as well as Coleman branded ones, and both brands are compatible with this stove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The lighter works freat! At first I didn't think it worked.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The lighter on the unit works great (but, after reading reviews, didn't think it would). The first time I tested I turned knob all the way to the left (beyond the 'flash' ignite mark) for several seconds and nothing but the smell of butane. I turned off, took out the canister, waited until gas had dissipated, and then tried again. This time I turned it directly to the 'flash' ignite mark for half a second and then a further click beyond that and it ignited immediately. I've tried it the same way over a dozen times now and it's always successful. The flame is great, lots of heat control between low and high settings (unlike with my Coleman propane grill) and the connection between canister and unit is perfect (also, unlike the screw-on propane tanks to my Coleman grill). Feels very safe and controlled. Would highly recommend. This is for our next Nor'easter without power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Working perfect and quality seems very good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great, easy to clean and store.
